title: ICAR IARI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Junior Research Fellow and Other Post
description: The Indian Agriculture Research Institute (ICAR IARI) has announced the official notification to fill up the vacancies of 02 Junior Research Fellow and Young Professional Jobs. Candidates who meet the eligibility criteria for the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech, Post Graduation, and M.Sc can visit the official website and apply for the ICAR IARI Recruitment for 2025. The application process has already started. Candidates need to apply on or before the last date of the application. Candidates can c...
